snippet.title: Courier of the Crypts - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Courier of the Crypts is available for PC on Steam, Humble Store & Itch.io
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/362940/Courier_of_the_Crypts/
Humble Store: https://www.humblebundle.com/store/courier-of-the-crypts
Itch.io: https://emberheartgames.itch.io/courier-of-the-crypts

Website: http://www.courierofthecrypts.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/GxrgsaB

Courier of the Crypts is 2D Puzzle Adventure game where you have to survive as a Courier on his first errand to the ominous crypts. Your main tool to achieve the delivery is a magic torch, which you use to illuminate your path, defend from darkness and solve puzzles.

-------------------------------------------------
©EMBERHEART GAMES
http://www.emberheartgames.com
